793020.name: Spring It! - Soundtrack
793020.description:
Includes Spring It's Original Soundtrack with music by AnM Studios in MP3 format. This is a 45 minute long album that includes six bonus tracks not heard in the game. These tracks were used to explore the different sounds we were considering throughout development.
Songs will be placed in your Spring It! folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Spring It!\Soundtrack

Tracklist
  • Spring It - 01 - Title
  • Spring It - 02 - First Set
  • Spring It - 03 - Second Set
  • Spring It - 04 - Third Set
  • Spring It - 05 - Fourth Set

Bonus Development Tracks
  • BioMechanical Metamorphosis
  • Distraughtic Robotic
  • Funky Factory
  • InFactory
  • Low Voltage Samba
  • Metallic Junble
